@metroid Doujin just means people who share the same interests/ hobbies and refers to self-published works (anime, manga, games, etc.). Doujinshi refers to self-published printed works which includes manga, novels, magazines, etc. So, yes, this is manga and doujin.

Anyway, this series has been a joy to follow. It reminds me of how my SO and I joke about how she's so amazing that she'll become Empress of the world one day with me as her royal sub.
